intension: Create an Instagram ad to promote a Super Bowl food offer at INBLAST.SE bar, offering beer and hot dogs for $10. Show that it's the best place to watch the game in town.
globalcaption: The image features a wooden table with a variety of food items displayed on it. There are several hot dogs, with one placed towards the left side of the table and another towards the right. A bowl of chips is located in the middle of the table, and a bottle can be seen on the left side.\n\nIn addition to the food items, there are two cups on the table, one near the top left corner and the other near the top right corner. A spoon is also visible, placed near the top right corner of the table. The table is set up for a Super Bowl party, offering a delicious spread of food for the guests to enjoy.
keywords: alcohol, american, bar, beer, beverage, drink, football, game, match, sports, super bowl, hot dog, ad, instagram, ig, insta, advertisement

A bowl of chips is also present on the table, located near the center. \n\nIn addition to the food, there are two cups on the table, one near the top left corner and the other near the top right corner. A bottle can be seen on the left side of the table, and a spoon is placed near the top right corner. The table setting creates an inviting atmosphere for a meal or snack

body.text: INBLAST.SE  |  BEER & HOT DOGS  |  BEST PLACE IN TOWN TO W
